overview: Inspired by the brave battle against cancer waged by songbird Lexi and her late husband Mike Allen, this inspiring gospel release offers a touching portrait of faith and family as only Lexi could offer. Though Allen was able to fight through his illness to produce, perform in, and ultimately complete this labor of love before his ultimate passing, the inspiring message that lives on could provide hope to those facing a similar struggle.
tagline: Recorded live at Detroit's Millennium Center
title: A Praise In The Valley
